{{Server client function}}
Gets player's level from database.

==Syntax==
<section name="Server" class="server" show="true">
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">string getPlayerGang ( player Player )</syntaxhighlight>

==Required Arguments==
*'''Player:''' Player element whose gang ID you want to get
</section>
<section name="Client" class="client" show="true">
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">string getPlayerGang ( player Player )</syntaxhighlight>

==Required Arguments==
*'''Player:''' Player element whose gang ID you want to get
</section>

==Returns==
*'''Gang:''' ID of the gang the player is currently in
